original: 'Chuck', 'Tenderloin', 'Round'...  You know the cuts of the meat.  And you certenly know how to slay it!
translation: “查克”，“里脊肉”，“圆形”。。。你知道肉的切块。你一定知道怎么杀它！

original: A Miltech battery-powered hi-tech light bending cloak.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: Miltech电池驱动的高科技轻型弯曲斗篷。它当前处于打开状态，并不断耗尽电池电量。用它来关掉它。

original: A Miltech battery-powered hi-tech light bending cloak.  Turn it on to became invisible.
translation: Miltech电池驱动的高科技轻型弯曲斗篷。打开它就看不见了。

original: A Miltech battery-powered tactical visor that amplify ambient light, with 'HUD' for enhancing perception purposes.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: Miltech电池供电的战术遮阳板，可放大环境光，并带有“HUD”以增强感知效果。它当前处于打开状态，并不断耗尽电池电量。用它来关掉它。

original: A Miltech battery-powered tactical visor that amplify ambient light, with 'HUD' for enhancing perception purposes.  Use it to turn it on.
translation: Miltech电池供电的战术遮阳板，可放大环境光，并带有“HUD”以增强感知效果。用它来打开它。

original: A Miltech lightweight protection mask with high efficiency multipurpose filters, that straps over mouth and nose only.  Provides very good environmental protection from smoke and other contaminants.
translation: 一种Miltech轻型防护面罩，配有高效多功能过滤器，只在口鼻上绑上带子。提供良好的环境保护，防止烟雾和其他污染物。

original: A custom-built leather utility belt covered with straps and pouches containing many useful hand tools and a comfortable quick draw holster for small guns.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种定制的皮革实用皮带，上面有皮带和袋子，里面有许多有用的手工工具和一个舒适的小手枪快速抽皮套。经久耐用，精心制作，穿着舒适。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A custom-built long-sleeved shirt covered in pouches with two ammo satchels to hold magazines close at hand.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to stash/draw magazines.
translation: 一件定制的长袖衬衫，上面包着两个弹药包，可以把杂志放在手边。经久耐用，精心制作，穿着舒适。激活以隐藏/绘制杂志。

original: A custom-built rigid version of the standard rioter shirt, padded in kevlar and bones.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to stash/draw up to two magazines.
translation: 一个定制的标准暴徒衬衫刚性版本，填充在凯夫拉和骨头。经久耐用，精心制作，穿着舒适。激活以存储/绘制最多两个杂志。

original: A custom-built rigid version of the standard rioter shirt, padded in kevlar and ceramic.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to stash/draw up to two magazines.
translation: 一个定制的标准暴徒衬衫刚性版本，填充在凯夫拉和陶瓷。经久耐用，精心制作，穿着舒适。激活以存储/绘制最多两个杂志。

original: A custom-built rigid version of the standard rioter shirt, padded in kevlar and chitin.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to stash/draw up to two magazines.
translation: 一个定制的标准暴徒衬衫刚性版本，填充在凯夫拉尔和几丁质。经久耐用，精心制作，穿着舒适。激活以存储/绘制最多两个杂志。

original: A kukri with a synthetic ceramic blade.  Extremely light, durable and sharper than any steel blade, this is a fearsome weapon.
translation: 带有合成陶瓷刀片的kukri。非常轻，耐用和锋利比任何钢刀片，这是一个可怕的武器。

original: A leather holster, big enough for a rifle or other large gun.  Designed to be strapped to the back.  It is engineered with a mechanism specific for fast draw.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 皮套一种皮套，大到足以装步枪或其他大枪。设计成绑在后面。它采用了专门用于快速拉伸的机构。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A lightweight Miltech helmet, that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage and also capable of transmitting vocals orders in the ultra high frequencies utilized by robots.  Activate it to command robots from afar.
translation: 一种轻巧的米泰克头盔，能提供极好的保护，免受各种损伤，还能以机器人使用的超高频传送声音指令。启动它，从远处指挥机器人。

original: A little laser projector of 'Augmented Reality', by Miltech.  When loaded, activate it up to three times to enhance your surroundings for a short period of time.
translation: Miltech的“增强现实”小型激光投影仪。加载时，最多激活三次，以在短时间内增强您的环境。

original: A makeshift armoured cotton trenchcoat that leaves your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.
translation: 一个临时装甲棉战壕外套，让你的手臂无障碍。口袋多，储物空间大。

original: A makeshift armoured cotton trenchcoat with pouches, padded in kevlar and bones.  It has a creepy look and it is also combined with a big leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉尔纤维和骨头填充的带口袋的临时防弹棉战壕大衣。它有一个令人毛骨悚然的外观，它还结合了一个大的皮革背皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift armoured cotton trenchcoat with pouches, padded in kevlar and ceramic.  It has an hi-tech look and it is also combined with a big leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种临时的带口袋的防弹棉战壕大衣，用凯夫拉纤维和陶瓷填充。它有一个高科技的外观，它还结合了一个大的皮革背皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift armoured cotton trenchcoat with pouches, padded in kevlar and chitin.  It has a nasty entomologic look and it is also combined with a big leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉尔和甲壳素填充的带口袋的临时防弹棉战壕大衣。它有一个讨厌的昆虫学外观，它还结合了一个大的皮革背皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift armoured cotton trenchcoat with pouches, that leaves your arms unencumbered.  It is also combined with a big leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一件临时的带口袋的防弹棉战壕外套，让你的手臂不受阻碍。它还结合了一个大的皮革背皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift armoured pair of pants lined with pockets, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.
translation: 一种临时穿的带口袋的带盔甲的裤子，与作为腰带的多用途带子结合在一起。

original: A makeshift armoured pair of pants lined with pockets, offering lots of storage.
translation: 一条带口袋的临时防弹裤，提供大量的储物空间。

original: A makeshift armoured pair of pants padded in kevlar and bones, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.  It has a creepy look.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉纤维和骨头填充的临时防弹长裤，与作为腰带的多用途绑带结合在一起。它看起来很恐怖。

original: A makeshift armoured pair of pants padded in kevlar and ceramic, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.  It has an hi-tech look.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉尔纤维和陶瓷填充的临时防弹裤，与作为腰带的多用途绑带相结合。它看起来很高科技。

original: A makeshift armoured pair of pants padded in kevlar and chitin, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.  It has a nasty entomologic look.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉纤维和甲壳素填充的临时的防弹裤，与一条多用途的带子相结合作为腰带。它有一个讨厌的昆虫学外观。

original: A makeshift bulletproof cotton trenchcoat with pouches, padded in superalloy and steel.  It has a bulky look and it is also combined with a big fast leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种临时的防弹棉制战壕大衣，有袋，用高温合金和钢填充。它有一个笨重的外观，它还结合了一个大的快速皮革背皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift bulletproof pair of pants padded in superalloy and steel, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.  It has a bulky look.
translation: 一种用高温合金和钢填充的临时防弹裤，与作为腰带的多用途绑带相结合。它看起来很笨重。

original: A makeshift heavy armoured cotton trenchcoat with pouches, padded in kevlar and steel.  It has a bulletproof look and it is also combined with a big fast leather back holster.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉纤维和钢填充的临时重型防弹棉战壕大衣。它有一个防弹的外观，它还结合了一个大的快速皮革后皮套。启动枪套/拔枪。

original: A makeshift heavy armoured pair of pants padded in kevlar and steel, combined with a multipurpose bandolier as belt.  It has a bulletproof look.
translation: 一种用凯夫拉纤维和钢填充的临时的重装甲裤子，与一条多用途的束带作为腰带相结合。它有防弹的外观。

original: A metal arm-guard that protect the forearm against injury.
translation: 保护前臂免受伤害的金属护臂。

original: A pair of Miltech reinforced Kevlar tactical gloves with actuators, sensors, stabilizer and motion control system.  They are currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 一副Miltech增强Kevlar战术手套，带有执行器、传感器、稳定器和运动控制系统。他们目前正在进行，并不断耗尽电池。用它来关掉它。

original: A pair of Miltech reinforced Kevlar tactical gloves with actuators, sensors, stabilizer and motion control system.  Use it to turn it on.
translation: 一副Miltech增强Kevlar战术手套，带有执行器、传感器、稳定器和运动控制系统。用它来打开它。

original: A small eggshell filled with ignitable smoking powder generally used to facilitate escape.  Use this item to light the fuse.  You will, of course, need a lighter or matches in your inventory to do this.
translation: 小蛋壳一种小蛋壳，里面装满可点燃的烟粉，通常用来帮助逃跑。用这个东西点燃保险丝。当然，你需要一个打火机或火柴在你的库存做这件事。

original: A tasty and nutritious mixture of proteins and vitamins compressed in a bar that can replace a complete meal.  An healthy bomb of energy!
translation: 一种由蛋白质和维生素组成的美味而营养的混合物，压缩在一个酒吧里，可以代替一顿完整的饭。健康的能量炸弹！

original: A thin and flat knife made for throwing, shaped like a star.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.
translation: 一种用来投掷的薄而平的刀，形状像星星。它的无效的切削刃和奇怪的形状使它不适合用作工具。

original: Adds a new set of professions and relative gears.
translation: 添加一组新的专业和相关齿轮。

original: An AppleSoft portable personal assistant in the form of a tablet PC.  The connection thing is useless, but 'Sirana' (the device 'AI') and his internal multipurpose database can still help you.  Runs on conventional batteries.
translation: 以平板电脑的形式出现的AppleSoft便携式个人助理。连接是无用的，但是“Sirana”（设备“AI”）和他的内部多用途数据库仍然可以帮助你。使用传统电池。

original: An heavy reshaped manhole cover, lightened and reforged as the throwing shield of the Captain.  Now you need only a flying Power Armor...
translation: 一个重的重新成形的人孔盖，作为船长的投掷盾牌被减轻和重新折叠。现在你只需要一个飞行能量盔甲。。。

original: Augmented Reality - HIGH: 'ID' for objects and creatures are shown, with other informations and biometrical data.
translation: 增强现实-高：显示物体和生物的“ID”，以及其他信息和生物特征数据。

original: Augmented Reality - LOW: A green grid helps to correctly evaluate heights and distances.
translation: 增强现实-低：绿色网格有助于正确评估高度和距离。

original: Augmented Reality - MEDIUM: Objects and creatures are highlited on the grid.
translation: 增强现实-媒体：物体和生物在网格上的高度。

original: Enjoy the perpetual solar-like light of this custom made atomic interior lamp and feel confident that you won't have to worry about depleting its power supply for at least 40 million years of faithful service.
translation: 享受这一定制的原子室内灯永恒的太阳能般的光，并感到有信心，你将不必担心它的电源耗尽至少4000万年的忠实服务。

original: From the flyer: 'The new portable Vulcan!  Enjoy your average ordinary everyday mass destruction!'.  By the way, the 'Miltech 135 Portable Plasma Gatling Minigun' is a 'not so portable' six rotating barrels big fucking beast blasting gun running fusion packs on UPS.
translation: 传单上写道：“新的便携式火神！享受你普通的日常大规模杀伤性武器吧。顺便说一句，“米泰克135便携式等离子转管微型枪”是一个“不那么便携式”六旋转桶大他妈的野兽爆破枪运行的UPS上的核聚变包。
格瓦阿！我的sss。。。人造卫星。。。愚蠢的！

original: The 'RIoter Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment' is an advanced military backpack heavily customized.  Armoured and covered with pockets, it uses two granade bandoliers as shoulder straps.
translation: “暴动者轻载设备”是一个先进的军用背包大量定制。盔甲和口袋覆盖，它使用两个格拉纳德肩带作为肩带。

original: The basic form of the sai is that of a pointed, prong shaped metal baton, with two curved prongs projecting from the handle.  It's like a skewer and you can also cook with it.
translation: sai的基本形式是尖头、尖头形金属棒，两个弯曲的尖头从手柄伸出。它就像一个串，你也可以用它做饭。

original: The blade of this broadsword is a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, making you the deadliest knight in the realm.  Your blademaster would be proud.
translation: 这把大刀的刀刃是一块非常坚硬、轻而锋利的高科技陶瓷片，使你成为这个王国中最致命的骑士。你的剑圣会很自豪的。

original: The blade of this combat knife is made out of very hard, light and tough hi-tech ceramic.
translation: 这把战斗刀的刀锋是由非常坚硬、轻便和坚韧的高科技陶瓷制成的。

original: The blade of this katana is made out of very hard and tough hi-tech ceramic.  It is now light, stronger and sharper than Muramasa could have ever dreamed.
translation: 这个武士刀的刀刃是用非常坚硬的高科技陶瓷制成的。它现在比村上春树想象的更轻、更强、更锋利。

original: The blade of this rapier is made out of very hard, light and tough hi-tech ceramic, rendering it far more deadly.
translation: 这把剑的剑刃是用非常坚硬、轻而坚韧的高科技陶瓷制成的，使它更加致命。

original: The bo is a very tall and long staff weapon usually made with hard or flexible wood, used in Okinawa and feudal Japan.
translation: “薄”是一种很高很长的棍子武器，通常由坚硬或柔韧的木头制成，用于冲绳和封建日本。

original: The butterfly is a folding pocket knife with two handles counter-rotating around the tang such that, when closed, the blade is concealed within grooves in the handles.  Use it to fold.
translation: 蝴蝶是一种折叠小刀，有两个手柄，围绕柄脚反向旋转，这样，当关闭时，刀片隐藏在手柄的凹槽内。用它来折叠。

original: The butterfly is a folding pocket knife with two handles counter-rotating around the tang such that, when closed, the blade is concealed within grooves in the handles.  Use it to unfold.
translation: 蝴蝶是一种折叠小刀，有两个手柄，围绕柄脚反向旋转，这样，当关闭时，刀片隐藏在手柄的凹槽内。用它来展开。

original: The edge of this kusarigama's blade has been enhanced with a coating of diamond-like carbon, making it far more deadly.
translation: 这把kusarigama刀的刃口被涂上了一层类似金刚石的碳，使其更加致命。

original: The fuse on this happo is lit and hissing.
translation: 这架飞机上的导火索亮着发出嘶嘶声。

original: The kusarigama is a traditional japanese weapon that consists of a sickle on a metal chain, with a heavy iron weight at the end.  It could be used to butcher corpses.
translation: kusarigama是一种传统的日本武器，由一个金属链上的镰刀组成，末端有一个沉重的铁锤。它可以用来屠宰尸体。

original: The nunchaku is a traditional okinawan martial arts weapon consisting of two sticks connected at one end by a short chain or rope.
translation: 双节棍是冲绳传统的武术武器，由两根棍子组成，一端用短链或绳子连接。

original: The proper term for this compound is anabolic-androgenic steroid and it is a synthetic variations of the male sex hormone testosterone.  You need a syringe to inject it.
translation: 对这种化合物的恰当称呼是合成代谢雄激素类固醇，它是雄性激素睾酮的合成变体。你需要一个注射器来注射。

original: The screaming bomb is 'alive'.  It'll explode any moment now.
translation: 尖叫的炸弹是“活着的”。随时都会爆炸的。

original: This WAS a talking doll, but now it is a screaming...  Well...  BOMB!  The grin on its face is insane.  The Joker would be proud of you!  Use this item to activate the timer.
translation: 这是一个会说话的娃娃，但现在它是一个尖叫。。。好。。。炸弹！它脸上的笑容是疯狂的。小丑会为你骄傲的！使用此项启动计时器。

original: This bayonet is made with a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, increasing its lethality.
translation: 这把刺刀是用一块非常硬，轻，锋利的高科技陶瓷片制成的，增加了它的杀伤力。

original: This hi-tech suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered high-efficiency heating elements.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这套高科技的薄型保暖内衣从头到脚都能覆盖你，并配有内置电池供电的高效加热元件。它当前处于打开状态，并不断耗尽电池电量。用它来关掉它。

original: This hi-tech suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered high-efficiency heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.
translation: 这套高科技的薄型保暖内衣从头到脚都能覆盖你，并配有内置电池供电的高效加热元件。用它来打开它。

original: This is a bag of vacuum packed tainted meat which is undergoing a strange chemical processes that will make it edible again.  A dezombification remedy?  Sadly, this is true only for slices of meat...  Activate it when it is done.
translation: 这是一袋真空包装的受污染的肉，它正在经历一种奇怪的化学过程，将使它再次食用。脱臭药？可悲的是，这只适用于肉片。。。完成后激活它。

original: This kusarigama is made out of very hard and tough hi-tech ceramic, making it far more deadly.
translation: 这款kusarigama由非常坚硬的高科技陶瓷制成，使其更加致命。

original: This nodachi's massive blade has been shaped with hi-tech ceramic, making it far more deadly.
translation: 这把野田佳彦的巨大刀刃用高科技陶瓷制成，使其更加致命。

original: This pistol bayonet is made with a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, increasing its lethality.
translation: 这种手枪刺刀是由一个非常硬，轻，锋利的高科技陶瓷片，增加其杀伤力。

original: This plutonium powered Miltech exoskeleton is a really useful powertool!  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这个钚动力的Miltech外骨骼是一个非常有用的动力工具！它当前处于打开状态，并不断耗尽电池电量。用它来关掉它。

original: This plutonium powered Miltech exoskeleton is a really useful powertool!  Use it to turn it on.
translation: 这个钚动力的Miltech外骨骼是一个非常有用的动力工具！用它来打开它。

original: This sword bayonet is made with a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, greatly augmenting its cutting damage.
translation: 这把剑刺刀是由一个非常硬，轻，锋利的高科技陶瓷片，大大增加了它的切割伤害。

original: This throwing star has been enhanced with a coating of diamond-like carbon, making it far more deadly.
translation: 这颗流星被涂上了一层类金刚石的碳，使其更加致命。

original: This throwing star is made out of very hard and tough hi-tech ceramic, making it far more deadly.
translation: 这个投掷星是由非常坚硬的高科技陶瓷制成的，使它更加致命。

original: This wakizashi's blade is a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, making it as strong as, well, hi-tech ceramic...
translation: 这个瓦基扎希的刀片是一个非常硬，轻，剃刀锋利的高科技陶瓷片，使它的强大，嗯，高科技陶瓷。。。

original: This zweihander's blade is a very hard, light and razor-sharp piece of hi-tech ceramic, making it pack even more of a punch.
translation: 这个zweihander的刀片是一个非常硬，轻和剃刀锋利的高科技陶瓷片，使它包更一拳。

original: Wickedly sharp, light and nearly indestructible, this machete cleaves vegetation and the living dead with equal ease.
translation: 这把弯刀锋利、轻巧，几乎坚不可摧，能轻易地砍断植物和活死人。

original: You are a crime scene analyst, also known as a forensic science technician.  You are a medic, a chemical specialist and also a detective.  So, you are simply useless, nowdays...
translation: 你是犯罪现场分析员，也被称为法医技术员。你是个医生，化学专家，还是个侦探。所以，你根本没用，现在。。。

original: You are a modern cyberninja Mk II 'Otomo' that walk the way of shinobi for the proud of your corporation.  The question is: are you a fault or a real robotic ninjitsu master?
translation: 你是一个现代的网络忍者Mk II'Otomo'走的路，shinobi为你的公司感到自豪。问题是：你是一个错误还是一个真正的机器人忍术大师？

original: You are a modern ninja that walk the way of shinobi and fight like a mercenary in the feudal Japan.  The question is: are you a fake or a real ninjitsu master?
translation: 你是一个现代忍者，走在忍者的道路上，像一个在封建日本雇佣军战斗。问题是：你是假的还是真的忍术高手？

original: You are a professional cybersurgeon that provides fast, reliable on-site and remote body operations, limbs repair and general bionic maintenance.
translation: 你是一个专业的网络外科医生，提供快速，可靠的现场和远程身体手术，四肢修复和一般仿生维修。

original: You are against the system and now the system is down!  So, now you are against...  SOMETHING!  FUCK YEAH!!!
translation: 你反对体制，现在体制倒下了！所以，现在你反对。。。有东西！他妈的耶！！！

original: You are an armoured badass unstoppable soldier with a nasty big fucking gun, but also a lone survivor with no support or resupply...  Don't waste your firepower!
translation: 你是一个穿着盔甲，拿着他妈的大炮，势不可挡的士兵，但也是一个没有支援和补给的孤独幸存者。。。别浪费你的火力！

original: You are the last step in human evolution.  A prodigy genetically forged and ready to learn how to rule'em all.  ...But now the world can't teach you anything and you are barely naked in the cataclysm!
translation: 你是人类进化的最后一步。一个天生的天才，准备学习如何统治他们。。。但是现在这个世界什么都教不了你，你在灾难中几乎没有赤身裸体！

original: You simply love hunting.  Now, the whole world is a big mess and for you it is like a big, funny safari...
translation: 你就是喜欢打猎。现在，整个世界一团糟，对你来说就像是一个大的，有趣的旅行。。。
